data.template:
How many hosts has the user logged onto in the time period?
**{0}**

What were the unique hosts involved?
**{1}**

| eval _raw = "{0}"
| rex field=_raw max_match=0 "'(?<host>[^']+)'"
| eval hosts = mvjoin(host,",")
| fields hosts

count from datamodel=Malware where host IN ({0})
| eval result = if(count > 0, "1", "0")
| fields result

Has Malware been detected on any of the hosts of interest ({0})?
**Yes**

Starting Incident Response

Has Malware been detected on any of the hosts of interest ({0})?
**No**

count from datamodel=Authentication where Authentication.user="{0}"
| eval result = if(count > 0, "1", "0")
| fields result

debug.description: Print debug messages with the type and value of 0-10 different inputs. This is useful for checking the values of input data or the outputs of other playbook blocks.
debug.label: debug
debug.name: debug

data.template:
Has user {0} has been active in the environment in the last seven days?
**Yes**

Has user {0} has been active in the environment in the last seven days?
**No**
dc(host) as host_count values(host) as host_list from datamodel=Authentication where Authentication.user="{0}"
